document_data.mainbody: Khaless''' was a game played by the [[drow]] of [[House Oblodra]] in [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.History: Around [[1358 DR]], the members of House Oblodra used this game to test courage.
document_data.Rules: In the game, Khaless, two drow would cast [[darkness]] and [[silence]] over the chasm known as [[Clawrift]]. The twin challengers would cast [[levitate|levitation]] and enter the globes. The drow who exited first would be the loser and in many cases both drow would fall to their deaths when their spells ran out.
document_data.Name: The name of the game derives from the drow word, [[Drow dictionary|Khaless]] which means ''trust''.
